data.title: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time Coverage
data.meta_description: The latest Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time breaking news, comment, reviews and features from the experts at GamesRadar+
data.text:
Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time remake is "now entering full production" after rebooting development last year

News A long time coming

Ubisoft drops magical hourglass, announces 2026 release for Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time remake

News Coming out six years after its first release date

Ubisoft is calling in backup from an internal studio for the troubled Prince of Persia: Sands of Time remake

news Ubisoft Toronto has been called in for the assist

Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time remake Trophies appear on PSN database once again

News The remake hasn't been heard from since 2022

The Prince of Persia remake is being remade

News Don't expect to see anything on Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time during this E3 season

Ubisoft says the Prince of Persia remake is going ahead despite cancelling pre-orders

news We're getting mixed signals when it comes to The Sands of Time remake

Chinese tech giant Tencent reportedly increasing its stake in Ubisoft

News The company currently owns a 5% share of Ubisoft

Prince of Persia remake isn't canceled, but is delayed indefinitely

News The Sands of Time remake is no longer due to release in FY 2023

Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time Remake actor "got to rewind time" for one of his earliest roles

News "This time I got to literally step into the shoes again"
